author: Taegan Goddard
title: GOP Senate Race In Pennsylvania Turns Ugly Early

sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
author: Lauren Frias
title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Dr. Oz Is Worth More Than $100 Million

sentence: That fact was borne out over the weekend when Trump endorsed TV doctor Mehmet Oz over hedge fund rich guy David McCormick in advance of next month's Republican Senate primary.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: The very simple reason why Donald Trump chose Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania

author: Taegan Goddard
title: McCormick Raised $4.3 Million in First Quarter
